item.title: Scanning People
item.description: The Problem Replicating someone’s likeness in a video game is like trying to paint the Mona Lisa with a paint-by-numbers kitâ€”except the paint is in invisible ink. Professional game studios have entire armies of artists to design the hair, the clothes, and everything in between. I, on the other hand, have a budget that could be comfortably described as “nonexistent” and skills that are “developing.” So, I need a shortcut to get realistic models into the game without turning into a hermit for months to learn new software.
